info.title: Amadeus QuickConnect

0.18.0: Add the cabin bags informations in the Flight-offer search response
Add Amenities details in the Flight-offer search response
0.17.1: Change description in lastTicketingDate and lastTicketingDateTime
0.17.0: Add lastTicketingDateTime attribute in the Flight-Offer
0.14.0: Add Margins and Discounts content from Margin Manager product
0.13.0: Add Expanded parameters criterias in flight-offers search
0.11.0: Add retrieve flight-order by record locator
0.9.0: Add currencies, aircraft and carriers dictionary
0.4.0: Add service catalogue into pricing flight offer reply
0.3.0: Add search flight-offer with GET operation

info.description: TO-DO: put high-level description of the API + List the limitations and pre-requisites, ...

post.summary: Return list of Flight Offers based on posted searching criteria.

parameters.name: getFlightOffersBody
parameters.description: list of criteria to retrieve a list of flight offers

get.summary: Return list of Flight Offers based on searching criteria.

parameters.name: originLocationCode
parameters.description: city/airport [IATA code](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) from which the traveler will depart, e.g. BOS for Boston

parameters.name: destinationLocationCode
parameters.description: city/airport [IATA code](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) to which the traveler is going, e.g. PAR for Paris

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: the date on which the traveler will depart from the origin to go to the destination. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2017-12-25

parameters.name: returnDate
parameters.description: the date on which the traveler will depart from the destination to return to the origin. If this parameter is not specified, only one-way itineraries are found. If this parameter is specified, only round-trip itineraries are found. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2018-02-28

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: the number of adult travelers (age 12 or older on date of departure).

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: the number of child travelers (older than age 2 and younger than age 12 on date of departure) who will each have their own separate seat. If specified, this number should be greater than or equal to 0

parameters.name: infants
parameters.description: the number of infant travelers (whose age is less or equal to 2 on date of departure). Infants travel on the lap of an adult traveler, and thus the number of infants must not exceed the number of adults. If specified, this number should be greater than or equal to 0

parameters.name: travelClass
parameters.description: most of the flight time should be spent in a cabin of this quality or higher. The accepted travel class is economy, premium economy, business or first class. If no travel class is specified, the search considers any travel class

parameters.name: includedAirlineCodes
parameters.description: if specified, the flight offer will include at least one segment per bound marketed by one of these airlines. Airlines are specified as [IATA airline codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) and are comma-separated, e.g. 6X,7X,8X

parameters.name: excludedAirlineCodes
parameters.description: if specified, the flight offer will exclude all the flights marketed by one of these airlines. Airlines are specified as [IATA airline codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) and are comma-separated, e.g. 6X,7X,8X

parameters.name: nonStop
parameters.description: if set to true, the search will find only flights going from the origin to the destination with no stop in between

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: the preferred currency for the flight offers. Currency is specified in the [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format, e.g. EUR for Euro

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: maximum price per traveler. By default, no limit is applied. If specified, the value should be a positive number with no decimals

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: maximum number of flight offers to return. If specified, the value should be greater than or equal to 1

errors.title: NOT FOUND
errors.detail: no response found for this query parameter

errors.title: CONFLICT WITH CURRENT STATE OF THE RESOURCE
errors.detail: The ressource in input already exist.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error

source.title: Issue_Source
source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

FlightSegment.description: defining a flight segment; including both operating and marketing details when applicable

number.description: the flight number as assigned by the carrier

duration.description: stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

stops.description: information regarding the different stops composing the flight segment. E.g. technical stop, change of gauge...

isFlown.description: indicator set to true if segment is flown

at.description: local date and time in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00

OriginalFlightStop.description: details of stops for direct or change of gauge flights

duration.description: stop duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

FlightStop.title: FlightStop
FlightStop.description: details of stops for direct or change of gauge flights

arrivalAt.description: arrival at the stop in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00

departureAt.description: departure from the stop in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00

total.description: Total amount paid by the user

refundableTaxes.description: The amount of taxes which are refundable

margin.description: BOOK step ONLY - The price margin percentage (plus or minus) that the booking can tolerate. When set to 0, then no price magin is tolerated.

grandTotal.description: Total amount paid by the user (including fees and selected additional services).

billingCurrency.description: Currency of the payment. It may be different than the requested currency

TravelClass.description: quality of service offered in the cabin where the seat is located in this flight. Economy, premium economy, business or first class

weight.description: Weight of Co2 emitted for the concerned segment

weightUnit.description: Code to qualify unit as pounds or kilos

binNumber.description: The first 6 digits of the credit card

flightOfferIds.description: Id of the flightOffers to pay

originRadius.description:
Include other possible locations around the point, located less than this distance in kilometers away. Max:300

Can not be combined with "dateWindow" or "timeWindow".

alternativeOriginsCodes.description: Set of alternative origin location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

destinationRadius.description:
Include other possible locations around the point, located less than this distance in kilometers away. Max:300

Can not be combined with "dateWindow" or "timeWindow".

alternativeDestinationsCodes.description: Set of alternative destination location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

departureDateTimeRange.description: Approximate date and time of departure, specified as a local date and time range.

arrivalDateTimeRange.description: Approximate date and time of arrival, specified as a local date and time range.

departureDateTime.description: Approximate date and time of departure, specified as a local date.

arrivalDateTime.description: Approximate date and time of arrival, specified as a local date.

originLocationCode.description: Origin location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

destinationLocationCode.description: Destination location, such as a city or an airport. Currently, only the locations defined in [IATA](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) are supported.

includedConnectionPoints.description: List of included connections points. When an includedViaPoints option is specified, all FlightOffer returned must at least go via this Connecting Point. Currently, only the locations defined in IATA are supported. Used only by the AMADEUS provider

excludedConnectionPoints.description: List of excluded connections points. Any FlightOffer with these connections points will be present in response. Currently, only the locations defined in IATA are supported. Used only by the AMADEUS provider

dateWindow.description:
Either 1, 2 or 3 extra days around the local date (IxD for +/- x days - Ex: I3D), Either 1 to 3 days after the local date (PxD for +x days - Ex: P3D), or 1 to 3 days before the local date (MxD for -x days - Ex: M3D)

Can not be combined with "originRadius" or "destinationRadius".

timeWindow.description:
1 to 12 hours around (both +and -) the local time. Possibly limited by the number of extra days when specified, i.e.  in some situations, it may not be used to exceed the maximum date range. [1-12]H format, e.g. 6H

Can not be combined with "originRadius" or "destinationRadius".

date.description: Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2018-12-25

associatedAdultId.description: if type="HELD_INFANT", corresponds to the adult travelers's id who will share the seat

excludeAllotments.description: This option allows to exclude the isAllotment flag associated to a booking class in the search response when it exist.

addOneWayOffers.description: This option allows activate the one-way combinable feature

maxFlightOffers.description: Maximum number of flight offers returned (Max 250)

maxPrice.description: maximum price per traveler. By default, no limit is applied. If specified, the value should be a positive number with no decimals

allowAlternativeFareOptions.description: This option allows to default to a standard fareOption if no offers are found for the selected fareOption.

oneFlightOfferPerDay.description: Requests the system to find at least one flight-offer per day, if possible, when a range of dates is specified. Default is false.

chargeableCheckedBags.description: If true, returns the price of the first additional bag when the airline is an "Amadeus Ancillary Services" member.

brandedFares.description: If true, returns the fare family name for each flight-offer which supports fare family

fareRules.description: If true, returns the fare rules before departure for each flight-offer when they are available

originDestinationIds.title: originDestinationIds
originDestinationIds.description: The list of originDestination identifiers for which the cabinRestriction applies

crossBorderAllowed.description: Allows to search a location outside the borders when a radius around a location is specified. Default is false.

moreOvernightsAllowed.description: This flag enables/disables the possibility to have more overnight flights in Low Fare Search

returnToDepartureAirport.description: This option force to retrieve flight-offer with a departure and a return in the same airport

railSegmentAllowed.description: This flag enable/disable filtering of rail segment (TGV AIR, RAIL ...)

busSegmentAllowed.description: This flag enable/disable filtering of bus segment

maxFlightTime.description: This option allows to define a maximum flying time in relation with the shortest solution. For example, a value of 120 will cause the search to return solutions that are at most 20% longer than the shortest one

blacklistedInEUAllowed.description: This flag enable/disable filtering of blacklisted airline by EU. The list of the banned airlines is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline

excludedCarrierCodes.description: This option ensures that the system will only consider these airlines.

includedCarrierCodes.description: This option ensures that the system will only consider these airlines.

maxNumberOfConnections.description: The maximal number of connections for each itinerary. Value can be 0, 1 or 2.

nonStopPreferred.description: When this option is requested, recommendations made of Non-Stop flights only are favoured by the search, on the whole itinerary, with a weight of 75%. It is possible to override this default 75% weight of Non-Stop recommendations by providing the requested weight in the attribute nonStopPreferredWeight

nonStopPreferredWeight.description: This weight is the percentage of total number of recommendations that could be returned for Non-Stop flight recommendations. It is only relevant when combined with nonSTopPreferred set to true. If not specified, the default weight of 75% is applied

airportChangeAllowed.description: Allow to change airport during connection

technicalStopsAllowed.description: This option allows the single segment to have one or more intermediate stops (technical stops).

sourceReference.description: Internal reference of the offer on the source side

instantTicketingRequired.description: If true, inform that a ticketing will be required at booking step

disablePricing.description: BOOK step ONLY - If true, allows to book a PNR without pricing. Only for the source "GDS"

nonHomogeneous.description: If true, upon completion of the booking, this pricing solution is expected to yield multiple records (a record contains booking information confirmed and stored, typically a Passenger Name Record (PNR), in the provider GDS or system)

oneWay.description: If true, the flight offer fulfills only one originDestination and has to be combined with other oneWays to complete the whole journey.

paymentCardRequired.description: If true, a payment card is mandatory to book this flight offer

lastTicketingDate.description: If booked on the same day as the search (with respect to timezone), this flight offer is guaranteed to be thereafter valid for ticketing until this date (included). Unspecified when it does not make sense for this flight offer (e.g. no control over ticketing once booked). YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-06-07

lastTicketingDateTime.description: If booked on the same day as the search (with respect to timezone), this flight offer is guaranteed to be thereafter valid for ticketing until this date/time (included). Unspecified when it does not make sense for this flight offer (e.g. no control over ticketing once booked). Local date and time in YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss format, e.g. 2017-02-10T20:40:00

numberOfBookableSeats.description: Number of seats bookable in a single request. Can not be higher than 9.

duration.description: duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M for a duration of 2h10m

fareType.description: type of fare of the flight-offer

corporateCodes.description: Allow Corporate negotiated fares using one or more corporate number (corporate code).

includedCheckedBagsOnly.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with included checked bags only

refundableFare.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with refundable fares only

noRestrictionFare.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with no restriction fares only

noPenaltyFare.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with no penalty fares only

validatingAirlineCodes.description: This option ensures that the system will only consider these airlines.

associatedAdultId.description: if type="HELD_INFANT", corresponds to the adult traveler's id who will share the seat

fareBasis.description: Fare basis specifying the rules of a fare. Usually, though not always, is composed of the booking class code followed by a set of letters and digits representing other characteristics of the ticket, such as refundability, minimum stay requirements, discounts or special promotional elements.

brandedFare.description: The code of the Fare Family corresponding to the fares. Only for the GDS and NDC providers and if the airline has fare families filled

brandedFareLabel.description: The name of the Fare Family. Only for the GDS and NDC providers and if the airline has fare families filled

class.description: The code of the booking class, a.k.a. class of service or Reservations/Booking Designator (RBD)

isAllotment.description: True if the corresponding booking class is in an allotment

includedCheckedBags.title: includedCheckedBags
includedCheckedBags.description: Details of the included checked bags

includedCabinBags.description: Details of the included cabin bags

mealServices.description: meal services proposed for the booked segment, there can be several, for example D DINNER + B BREAKFAST

chargeableSeatNumber.description: DEPRECATED - use the chargeableSeat attribute -  seat number

fareRules.description: Fare rules of the flight offer

minimumDelayBeforeTicketing.description: Required delay before being able to ticket. This option ensures that the system will only search for flight-offers which can still be ticketed the last day after this delay. If booked on the same day as the search (with respect to provider timezone), such flight-offers are guaranteed to be thereafter valid for ticketing at least during this delay (last day included). This option has no effect on flight-offers for which the last ticketing date does not make sense. Overrides the default settings. Max 365D

corporateCodes.description: Allow Corporate negotiated fares using one or more corporate number (corporate code).

includedCheckedBagsOnly.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with included checked bags only

refundableFare.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with refundable fares only

noRestrictionFare.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with no restriction fares only

noPenaltyFare.description: If true, returns the flight-offers with no penalty fares only

blacklistedInEU.description:
When the flight has a marketing or/and operating airline that is identified as blacklisted by the European Commission. 

To improve travel safety, the European Commission regularly updates the list of the banned carriers from operating in Europe. It allows any Travel Agency located in the European Union to easily identify and hide any travel recommendation based on some unsafe airlines. 
The [list of the banned airlines](https://ec.europa.eu/transport/sites/transport/files/air-safety-list_en.pdf) is published in the Official Journal of the European Union, where they are included as annexes A and B to the Commission Regulation. The blacklist of an airline can concern all its flights or some specific aircraft types pertaining to the airline

TravelerType.description:
traveler type
age restrictions : CHILD < 12y, HELD_INFANT < 2y, SEATED_INFANT < 2y, SENIOR >=60y

FareOptions.description:
option specifying a group of fares, which may be valid under certain conditons
can be used to specify special fare discount for a passenger

Coverage.description: part of the trip covered by the travel class restriction (ALL_SEGMENTS if ommited)

Commission.title: Commission
Commission.description: This element is used to record commissions earned from the sale of a ticket, as percentage or amount. Associated to FM fare element in PNR

values.description: Details on each commission value contained in the FM entry

travelerIds.description: Ids of the concerned travelers, if not filled commission applies to all travelers

segmentIds.description: Ids of the impacted segments, if not filled commission applies to all segments

percentage.description: Percentage in case of a rate commission - can be decimal

CommissionControl.description:
Controls are specified in the FM element to indicate the way the commission is calculated depending on the CCI attribute in the issuing office profile.
Only MANUAL can be added to flight order

PricingOptionsFareType.description: type of fare of the flight-offer

TravelerPricingFareOption.description:
option specifying a group of fares, which may be valid under certain conditons
Can be used to specify special fare discount for a passenger

SliceDiceIndicator.description: slice and Dice indicator, such as Local Availability, Sub OnD(Origin and Destination) 1 Availability and Sub OnD 2 Availability

tourName.description: The tour name agreed for this specific allotment.

tourReference.description: The tour reference agreed for this specific allotment.

cityCode.description: City code associated to the airport

category.description: This defines what type of modification is concerned in this rule.

currencyCode.description: The currency code, as defined in [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217), to reflect the currency in which this amount is expressed.

originDestinations.title: originDestinations
originDestinations.description: Origins and Destinations must be properly ordered in time (chronological order in accordance with the timezone of each location) to describe the journey consistently. Dates and times must not be past nor more than 365 days in the future, according to provider settings.Number of Origins and Destinations must not exceed the limit defined in provider settings.

travelers.title: travelers
travelers.description:
travelers in the trip.
Maximum number of passengers older than 2 yo (CHILD, ADULT, YOUNG, SENIOR, STUDENT): 9.
Each adult can travel with one INFANT so maximum total number of passengers: 18

sources.title: sources
sources.description:
Allows enable one or more sources. If present in the list, these sources will be called by the system. 
GDS : Full service carriers,
EAC : Extended Air choice,
LTC : Light Ticketing,
PYTON : Direct connection Pyton
NDC : NDC content

FlightOfferPricingIn.title: FlightOfferPricing-Input
FlightOfferPricingIn.description: input parameter to price flight offers element

flightOffers.description: list of flight offer to price

payments.description: payment information for retrieve eventual credit card fees

fareRules.description: if true, returns the fare rules for each flight-offer when they are available

flightOffers.description: list of flight offer to price

invoiceAddressRequired.description: If true, an invoice address is required for the creation of the flight-order

mailingAddressRequired.description: If true, a postal address is required for the creation of the flight-order

emailAddressRequired.description: If true, an email address is required for the creation of the flight-order

phoneCountryCodeRequired.description: If true, the phone country code (e.g. '33') associated for each phone number is required for the creation of the flight-order

mobilePhoneNumberRequired.description: If true, a mobile phone number is required for the creation of the flight-order

phoneNumberRequired.description: If true, a phone number is required for the creation of the flight-order

postalCodeRequired.description: If true, a postal code is required for the creation of the flight-order

genderRequired.description: If true, the gender is required for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

documentRequired.description: If true, a document is required for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

documentIssuanceCityRequired.description: If true, the isuance city of the document is required for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

dateOfBirthRequired.description: If true, the date of bitrth is required for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

redressRequiredIfAny.description: If true, the redress is required if any for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

airFranceDiscountRequired.description: If true, the Air France discount is required for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

spanishResidentDiscountRequired.description: If true, the Spanish resident discount is required for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

residenceRequired.description: If true, the address is required for the concerned traveler for the creation of the flight-order

flightOfferId.description: Id of the flightOffer concerned by the credit card fee

segmentId.description: Id of the segment concerned by the fare rule

bookableByItinerary.description: Specify if the service is bookable by itinerary  or for all itineraries

segmentIds.description: Id of the segment concerned by the service

travelerIds.description: Id of the traveler concerned by the service

amount.description: Amount of the fare. could be alpha numeric. Ex- 500.20 or 514.13A, 'A'signifies additional collection.

weightUnit.description: Code to qualify unit as pounds or kilos

bookableByTraveler.description: Specify if the service is bookable by traveler or for all travelers

bookableByItinerary.description: Specify if the service is bookable by itinerary or for all itineraries

segmentIds.description: Id of the segment concerned by the service

travelerIds.description: Id of the traveler concerned by the service

amenityProvider.title: AmenityProvider
amenityProvider.description: Provides more information on the Source of the Amenity Content

name.description: Name of the source of the Amenity Content

amenitySeat.title: AmenitySeat
amenitySeat.description: Characteristics for a group of seat, such as Distance from one seat to another, only provided when amenityType=SEAT

FlightOrder.title: FlightOrderCreateQuery
FlightOrder.description: input parameter to create a flight order

id.description: unique identifier of the flight order

queuingOfficeId.description: office Id where to queue the order

ownerOfficeId.description: office Id where will be transfered the ownership of the order

commissions.description: list of commissions applicable to tickets

formOfIdentifications.description: list of forms of identifications applicable to travelers by airline

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth in ISO 8601 format (yyyy-mm-dd)

documents.description: Advanced Passenger Information - regulatory identity documents - SSR DOCS & DOCO elements

validityCountry.description: [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) of the country where the document is valid

holder.description: boolean to specify if the traveler is the holder of the document

Document.description: the information that are found on an ID document

number.description: The document number (shown on the document) . E.g. QFU514563221J

issuanceDate.description: Date at which the document has been issued.

expiryDate.description: Date after which the document is not valid anymore.

issuanceCountry.description: [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) of the country that issued the document

issuanceLocation.description: A more precise information concerning the place where the document has been issued, when available. It may be a country, a state, a city or any other type of location. e.g. New-York

nationality.description: [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) of the nationality appearing on the document

birthPlace.description: Birth place as indicated on the document

addresseeName.description: Adressee name (e.g. in case of emergency purpose it corresponds to name of the person to be contacted).

countryCode.description: Country code of the country (ISO3166-1). E.g. "US" for the United States

number.description: Phone number. Composed of digits only. The number of digits depends on the country.

FormOfIdentification.description: alternative means of identifying stakeholders for eTicket.

number.description: identification number relative to the type of identification either ticket number, booking number, passport number, identity card number, drivers licence number, other ID

FormOfIdentification.title: FormOfIdentification

loyaltyPrograms.description: list of loyalty program followed by the traveler

discountEligibility.description: list of element that allow a discount.

ContactPurpose.description: the purpose for which this contact is to be used

addresseeName.description: the name of the person addressed by these contact details

language.description: the preferred language of communication with this Contact

BaseName.description: description of the name of a physical person

middleName.description: Middle name(s), for example "Lee" in "John Lee Smith".

countryCallingCode.description: Country calling code of the phone number, as defined by the International Communication Union. Examples - "1" for US, "371" for Latvia.

number.description: Phone number. Composed of digits only. The number of digits depends on the country.

PhoneDeviceType.description: Type of the device (Landline, Mobile or Fax)

lines.description: Line 1 = Street address, Line 2 = Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc

delay.description: Delay before applying automatic process if no issuance in days

dateTime.description: Exact date to apply automatic process if no issuance. YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-06-07

TicketingAgreementOption.description:
Ticketing agreement option
* **CONFIRM**, when the payment is done
* **DELAY_TO_QUEUE**, queue the reservation at a wished date if the payment is not done
* **DELAY_TO_CANCEL**, cancel the reservation at a wished date if the payment is not done

Queueing and cancellation occurs at local date and time. When no time is specified, reservation is queued or cancelled at 00:00.

AutomatedProcessCommon.description: Provides information on ticketing arrangements and Amadeus Time Limits

queue.title: Queue
queue.description: Identifies the queue onto which PNR must be automatically placed upon process execution.

AutomatedProcess.title: Automated Process
AutomatedProcess.description: automatic process applied to the Order

delay.description: Delay before applying process in days

officeId.description: Office into which the process must be triggered.

dateTime.description: Datetime limit at which the process takes action in case issuance is not done.

keyword.description: keyword code - only applicable for subType Keyword

airlineCode.description:
Code of the airline following IATA standard ([IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx))

When it apply to any airline, value is YY.

b2bWallet.description: payment with the solution B2B Wallet

VirtualCreditCardDetails.description: detail information of the virtual card

holder.description: card holder as on the card

expiryDate.description: credit card expiration date following [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) (YYYY-MM format, e.g. 2012-08)

AssociatedRecordCommon.description: describes the relation between the current reservation and another one

reference.description: Record locator [Amadeus or OA] with which the current reservation is related. In case of a codeshare relation, it enables to identify the operating PNR.

creationDate.description: Creation date of the referenced reservation. Date and time in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.sss format, e.g. 2019-07-09T12:30:00.000

originSystemCode.description: Designates the system which has originated the referenced reservation.

flightOfferId.description: id of the impacted flight offer

documentNumber.description: Identifier of the travel document prefixed by its owner code [NALC - 3 digits]. Can either be a primary or a conjunctive document number. Necessary for TicketingReference definition.

documentStatus.description: Status of the travel document contained in the fare element

400_Search.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
425     | INVALID DATE
477     | INVALID FORMAT
572     | INVALID OPTION
2668    | PARAMETER COMBINATION INVALID/RESTRICTED
2781    | INVALID LENGTH
